title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection, with pedestrian and other cars nearby.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the presence of pedestrians and other cars. It is approaching an intersection, where it is about to stop. The driver is cautious and maintains a safe distance from the pedestrian and other vehicles. The rainy weather requires extra attention to avoid potential accidents.
